      boolean sync()
      Returns true if peer sync was successful, meaning that this core may not be considered to have the latest updates when considering the last N updates between it and its peers.

        public long percentile(List<Long> arr,

      • sync

        public boolean sync()
        Returns true if peer sync was successful, meaning that this core may not be considered to have the latest updates when considering the last N updates between it and its peers. A commit is not performed.

      • sync

        public static void sync(SolrCore core,
        List<String> replicas,
        int nUpdates)
        Requests and applies recent updates from peers
